#summary ZigBee shield for Arduino

= Introduction =

KittyBee 可以直接放上Arduino的基本format, 目前有 high power(18dbm)跟low power(4dbm)兩種硬體版本, 每一種硬體都可以選擇 Coordinator/Router/End device 的 [CatcanCMDfirmware], device的種類
comes with 2 versions in terms of hardware, one with high power at 18dbm, one with low power at 4 dbm. Both comes with catcan CMD firmware on board( Coordinator/Router/End device), allow arduino user to set up easily a simple wireless network.

= Details =

CMD set and usage can be found in download page.
